content: this is the ad-free pdf version of the pattern for the free version please visit my blog at the following link http //nanascraftyhome com/boho-market-bag-free-crochet-pattern/ i used every bit of 2 cakes of yarn if your gauge is even slightly different you may need 3 cakes to complete a fun and easy project made with the stacked granny stitch easily could be finished in an evening or two enjoy
